title: Bug 114470[Smoke] Error message thrown when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
description: When using the JavaScript function new Date('3/2/2005') as a value in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
OB: When trying to use new Date('3/2/2005') as a filter value in a table, an error message is displayed.
EB: The filter should accept new Date('3/2/2005') as a valid value and correctly filter the table based on the date.
SR: 1. Create a datasource and a dataset that contains a datetime column. 2. Insert a table component and create a filter based on the datetime column. 3. In the value field of the filter, input new Date('3/2/2005') (e.g., new Date('3/2/2005')).
